mapper.insert: insert into db_purchasehand (SEQUENCEID, SID, PRODUCTID, MANUFACTURE, ORDERNUM, INPORTPRICE, AMOUNT, INPORTTIME, ACTUALNUM, ACTUALPRICE, ACTUALAMOUNT, STOCKOPER, STOCKTIME, SLEVEL, 'STATUS', OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, SAVENUM, CORPID, OPENFLAG, MANUFACTUREID, GROUPID, RECEIVENUM, RETURNNUM, RESULTTYPE, DESCR, RESERVE3, 'NAME', REMARKS, 'RESULT') values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manufacture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inporttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actualnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{actualprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{actualamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stockoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stocktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{slevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{savenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manufactureid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receivenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{returnnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{resulttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_purchasehand set SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANUFACTURE = #{manufacture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERNUM = #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INPORTPRICE = #{inportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INPORTTIME = #{inporttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACTUALNUM = #{actualnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTUALPRICE = #{actualprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTUALAMOUNT = #{actualamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STOCKOPER = #{stockoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOCKTIME = #{stocktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SLEVEL = #{slevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'STATUS' = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAVENUM = #{savenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANUFACTUREID = #{manufactureid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEIVENUM = #{receivenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RETURNNUM = #{returnnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESULTTYPE = #{resulttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, 'RESULT' = #{result,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SID, PRODUCTID, MANUFACTURE, ORDERNUM, INPORTPRICE, AMOUNT, INPORTTIME, ACTUALNUM, ACTUALPRICE, ACTUALAMOUNT, STOCKOPER, STOCKTIME, SLEVEL, 'STATUS', OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, SAVENUM, CORPID, OPENFLAG, MANUFACTUREID, GROUPID, RECEIVENUM, RETURNNUM, RESULTTYPE, DESCR, RESERVE3, 'NAME', REMARKS, 'RESULT' from db_purchasehand where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, SID, PRODUCTID, MANUFACTURE, ORDERNUM, INPORTPRICE, AMOUNT, INPORTTIME, ACTUALNUM, ACTUALPRICE, ACTUALAMOUNT, STOCKOPER, STOCKTIME, SLEVEL, 'STATUS', OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, SAVENUM, CORPID, OPENFLAG, MANUFACTUREID, GROUPID, RECEIVENUM, RETURNNUM, RESULTTYPE, DESCR, RESERVE3, 'NAME', REMARKS, 'RESULT' from db_purchasehand
